description:
Whether you’re a current Warhammer 40k Kill Team player, or you’re merely Kill Team-curious, you can now grab all the rules needed to play the game for free from the Warhammer Community website and as a new app. Games Workshop released the rules for 33 Kill Teams, including the brand new Vespid and Tempestus Aquilons, on Wednesday.

Continue reading Get your Warhammer 40,000 Kill Team faction rules free, right now
MORE FROM WARGAMER: How to play Warhamm
title: Get your Warhammer 40,000 Kill Team faction rules free, right now

description:
On Monday, when Wizards of the Coast made the shock announcement it was assuming control of Magic: The Gathering’s Commander format, it also spoke about the new four-tier system it is developing to help players determine their deck’s power level and have easier pre-game conversations.

Continue reading This is how Wizards is ranking MTG cards for Commander
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order,
title: This is how Wizards is ranking MTG cards for Commander

description:
Lead Magic: The Gathering staff have promised that the new Commander committee organized by Wizards of the Coast will make “love of the game” a major priority when deciding future bans. In an official MTG YouTube video from October 2, vice president of game design Aaron Forsythe says that “making the game as fun as possible is the way we’re gonna make our money”. “Our motives should align with how most people enjoy the game.”

Continue reading MTG pledges its new Commander committee will prioritize “love of the game
title: MTG pledges its new Commander committee will prioritize “love of the game”
